divs: sighting detailsi work at a hospital as a custodian. my shift ended at 12:30am on friday august 30th. 2013. i was driving home. i made a right turn off of west line street onto seevee lane headed north. the light caught my attention because it was very bright, almost like a searchlight but it was not panning back and forth like a searchlight from a helicopter would do. i slowed down so i could observe it while driving. it was straight ahead of me on seevee lane about 1\2 a mile away, but i cannot be sure because it was dark and i have no way of comparing it to any landmarks. it slowly moved to the east towards the white mountains. i observed it for about 1 minute or less. it gave me a strange feeling and i know it was not a conventional aircraft because there were no blinking lights and it seemed to move more slowly than even a helicopter. i was going to wake my wife when i got home but by that time it was out of sight. the most unusual thing about it was how bright it was, otherwise i would not even bother sharing this. i would like to know if anyone else from my area saw this too. thank you.
Summary: Very bright white object slowly moving to the east. Not blinking and low in the sky. Much brighter than the street lights.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Bishop
There were no other sightings in Bishop on or around August 30th 2013
